entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Coral Harbour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:22 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -44.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Coral Harbour Airport 01:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -44.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 63 %
Wind Chill: -59
Dewpoint: -49.0°C

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 43.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind north 20 km/h. Low minus 43. Wind chill minus 52 this evening and minus 60 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 3:00 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 36.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind north 20 km/h. High minus 36. Wind chill minus 60 in the morning and minus 51 in the afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 3:00 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
